message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product. I believe it holds immense value, and I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Given its potential, I'm offering it for $1,900,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1,300,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Bob, I understand your desire to find a good deal.  While your offer is appreciated, the value of this product is significant. I'm willing to come down to $1,700,000. This is my final offer.
I understand that the product is valuable, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1,400,000 for the product. I think this is a reasonable compromise.
